org.jgentleframework.core.factory.support
Class CoreProcessorImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.core.factory.support.AbstractProcesserChecker
      org.jgentleframework.core.factory.support.CoreProcessorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CoreProcessor
public class CoreProcessorImpl
extends AbstractProcesserChecker
implements CoreProcessor

This is core processor of JGentle system which is a part of JGentle kernel, is responsible for bean instantiation. All core services of JGentle are deployed in CoreProcessorImpl, includes IoC, Interceptor, AOP ... CoreProcessorImpl

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
